name: mailivo-monorepo
description: Email Marketing Platform with Landivo Integration

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:app" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:components"
scripts.build: npm run build:components && npm run build:app && npm run build:api
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd app && npm install && cd ../api && npm install && cd ../packages/landivo/email-template && npm install
